1.title: 1. Pro koho je tato platforma?
1.content:
ScamNemesis je pro lidi, kte≈ô√≠ chtƒõj√≠ ovƒõ≈ôit osobu, firmu, telefonn√≠ ƒç√≠slo, e-mail nebo webovou str√°nku. Seznam lze naj√≠t zde. Je tak√© pro lidi, kte≈ô√≠ ji≈æ byli podvedeni a chtƒõj√≠ nahl√°sit sv≈Øj p≈ô√≠pad a spojit se s dal≈°√≠mi obƒõ≈•mi stejn√©ho pachatele. Platforma pom√°h√° jak bƒõ≈æn√Ωm u≈æivatel≈Øm, tak profesion√°l≈Øm ‚Äî policii, novin√°≈ô≈Øm, pr√°vn√≠k≈Øm, analytik≈Øm, bank√°m a burz√°m. Nahl√°≈°en√© p≈ô√≠pady lze zas√≠lat partner≈Øm p≈ôes API, kte≈ô√≠ mohou pozastavit platby a ochr√°nit va≈°e pen√≠ze (slu≈æba v p≈ô√≠pravƒõ). V≈°echny hl√°≈°en√≠ jsou p≈ôed publikac√≠ ruƒçnƒõ kontrolov√°ny odborn√≠ky.

Rozli≈°it podvod od legitimn√≠ slu≈æby je dnes tƒõ≈æk√© ‚Äî ka≈æd√Ω m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt oklam√°n. Pokud se v√°m to stalo, nejste sami; jsme tu, abychom pomohli.

2.title: 2. Jak√Ω probl√©m ≈ôe≈°√≠me?
2.content:
Neexistuje jedin√© "glob√°ln√≠" ƒç√≠slo, ale data ukazuj√≠, ≈æe online podvody vzrostly mezi lety 2019 a 2024 p≈ôibli≈ænƒõ o 2 300 %; v roce 2024 odhadovan√© ztr√°ty dos√°hly 1,03 bilionu USD. V praxi m≈Ø≈æe jeden podvodn√≠k vytvo≈ôit 10‚Äì100 p≈ô√≠pad≈Ø mƒõs√≠ƒçnƒõ, co≈æ fragmentuje d≈Økazy a v√°≈ænƒõ p≈ôetƒõ≈æuje policii, co≈æ ztƒõ≈æuje efektivn√≠ ≈ôe≈°en√≠ p≈ô√≠pad≈Ø.

ScamNemesis vn√°≈°√≠ do tohoto chaosu po≈ô√°dek: konsoliduje hl√°≈°en√≠ a d≈Økazy do jednoho koordinovan√©ho p≈ô√≠padu, automaticky propojuje obƒõti s podobn√Ωmi vzorci, ≈°et≈ô√≠ ƒças vy≈°et≈ôovatel≈Øm a urychluje vy≈°et≈ôov√°n√≠. Funguje tak√© preventivnƒõ ‚Äî kdokoli m≈Ø≈æe ovƒõ≈ôit osobu, firmu, dom√©nu, telefonn√≠ ƒç√≠slo a 38 dal≈°√≠ch identifik√°tor≈Ø spojen√Ωch s podvody. N√°stroj je zdarma a dostupn√Ω v≈°em.

3.title: 3. Jak pou≈æ√≠vat ScamNemesis?
3.content:
Vyhled√°v√°n√≠:

Naho≈ôe najdete vyhled√°vac√≠ li≈°tu, kde m≈Ø≈æete zadat jm√©no, e-mail, telefonn√≠ ƒç√≠slo a dal≈°√≠ identifik√°tory ‚Äî seznam je zde. V√Ωsledky jsou zobrazeny podle sk√≥re shody ‚Äî ƒç√≠m n√≠≈æe se polo≈æka nach√°z√≠, t√≠m slab≈°√≠ je shoda, proto doporuƒçujeme zkontrolovat v√≠ce p≈ô√≠pad≈Ø. Kliknut√≠m na p≈ô√≠pad se otev≈ôe hl√°≈°en√≠ se v≈°emi informacemi od oznamovatele. Nƒõkter√° data jsou z bezpeƒçnostn√≠ch a pr√°vn√≠ch d≈Øvod≈Ø anonymizov√°na. Hl√°≈°en√≠ mohou obsahovat fotografie, dokumenty a koment√°≈ôe ostatn√≠ch; m≈Ø≈æete tak√© p≈ôidat vlastn√≠ koment√°≈ô. Funkce "Naj√≠t podobn√© p≈ô√≠pady" zobrazuje z√°znamy s nejvy≈°≈°√≠ podobnost√≠ a p≈ôesnƒõ vysvƒõtluje, co se shodovalo a do jak√© m√≠ry (nap≈ô. stejn√© telefonn√≠ ƒç√≠slo).

Nahla≈°ov√°n√≠:

Pokud jste byli podvedeni, kliknƒõte na Nahl√°sit podvod. Otev≈ôe se formul√°≈ô ‚Äî vƒõt≈°ina pol√≠ je voliteln√°, ale doporuƒçujeme p≈ôidat co nejv√≠ce podrobnost√≠. Data oznamovatele jsou p≈ô√≠snƒõ anonymn√≠ a nesd√≠l√≠ se; nevy≈æadujeme skuteƒçn√© jm√©no ani prim√°rn√≠ e-mail (m≈Ø≈æete pou≈æ√≠t samostatnou adresu jen pro tento √∫ƒçel). Uchov√°vejte sv√© p≈ô√≠stupov√© √∫daje v bezpeƒç√≠. E-mailem obdr≈æ√≠te pokyny a odkaz pro spr√°vu va≈°eho p≈ô√≠padu ‚Äî p≈ôid√°n√≠, √∫pravy nebo smaz√°n√≠ z datab√°ze.

Interpretace shod:

Pamatujte, ≈æe stejn√© jm√©no ‚â† stejn√° osoba. Pokud hled√°te "Jan Nov√°k" v ƒåR a najdete "Jan Nov√°k" na Slovensku pro jin√Ω typ podvodu, je to pravdƒõpodobnƒõ jen jmenovec. Vyhodno≈•te kontext (zemƒõ, typ podvodu, ƒças, dal≈°√≠ identifik√°tory). Nejspolehlivƒõj≈°√≠mi sign√°ly jsou jedineƒçn√° data jako e-mail, telefonn√≠ ƒç√≠slo, bankovn√≠ √∫ƒçet/IBAN nebo krypto adresa. Nesk√°kejte k z√°vƒõr≈Øm ‚Äî buƒète opatrn√≠.

4.title: 4. Proƒç je to d≈Øle≈æit√©?
4.content:
Ka≈æd√Ω nenahl√°≈°en√Ω podvod pom√°h√° podvodn√≠k≈Øm dos√°hnout na v√≠ce obƒõt√≠, zp≈Øsobuje v√≠ce zniƒçen√Ωch ≈æivot≈Ø a vytv√°≈ô√≠ v√≠ce utrpen√≠ pro obƒõti a jejich rodiny. Chceme to zastavit.

Kdy≈æ komunity sd√≠lej√≠ data nap≈ô√≠ƒç zemƒõmi, objevuj√≠ se vzorce: stejn√° "investiƒçn√≠ p≈ô√≠le≈æitost" se objevuje v des√≠tk√°ch st√°t≈Ø, identick√° profilov√° fotka bƒõ≈æ√≠ p≈ôes des√≠tky fale≈°n√Ωch √∫ƒçt≈Ø a stejn√° krypto penƒõ≈æenka je propojena se zn√°m√Ωmi podvodn√Ωmi s√≠tƒõmi. Sd√≠len√° inteligence rozb√≠j√≠ jejich nejvƒõt≈°√≠ v√Ωhodu ‚Äî izolaci. Varov√°n√≠ jedn√© osoby se st√°v√° ochranou pro v≈°echny.

ScamNemesis sjednocuje, ƒçist√≠ a vyhodnocuje tyto sign√°ly, aby vy≈°et≈ôovac√≠ t√Ωmy mohly prioritizovat to, co je d≈Øle≈æit√©. Proto budujeme jednoduch√© integrace ‚Äî API, widget a forenzn√≠ n√°stroje ‚Äî aby data mohla b√Ωt okam≈æitƒõ pou≈æita v extern√≠ch syst√©mech pro skuteƒçnou prevenci a rychlej≈°√≠ reakci.

5.title: 5. Proƒç jsme tento projekt vytvo≈ôili?
5.content:
Projekt se zrodil ze zlosti a frustrace z neefektivn√≠ch policejn√≠ch metod. Sami jsme se stali obƒõ≈•mi podvodu a policie n√°m nemohla pomoci, proto≈æe byla p≈ôet√≠≈æen√° a postr√°dala n√°stroje a odbornost k ≈ôe≈°en√≠ modern√≠ch typ≈Ø podvod≈Ø. Kdy≈æ nƒõkdo p≈ôijde o v≈°echny sv√© pen√≠ze, je to pro nƒõj a jeho rodinu devastuj√≠c√≠. To se mus√≠ zastavit!

Policejn√≠ jednotky, od kter√Ωch se oƒçek√°v√°, ≈æe "pomohou" v nejtƒõ≈æ≈°√≠ch chv√≠l√≠ch a budou spolehliv√©, ƒçasto nemohou pomoci, zat√≠mco modern√≠ podvodn√° kriminalita roste alarmuj√≠c√≠m tempem.

Je ƒças jednat, proto jsme se rozhodli vyu≈æ√≠t na≈°e znalosti OSINT, hackingu a zpravodajstv√≠ k pomoci lidem a vy≈°et≈ôovac√≠m t√Ωm≈Øm s prevenc√≠ a odhalov√°n√≠m podvod≈Ø.

6.title: 6. Co je ScamNemesis?
6.content:
Komunitou ≈ô√≠zen√° verifikaƒçn√≠ a zpravodajsk√° platforma, kter√° kombinuje datab√°zi nahl√°≈°en√Ωch podvod≈Ø, sledov√°n√≠ blockchainu, monitoring p≈ôes 130+ datov√Ωch zdroj≈Ø, ovƒõ≈ôov√°n√≠ telefon≈Ø a e-mail≈Ø, rozpozn√°v√°n√≠ obliƒçej≈Ø, forenziku dokument≈Ø (OCR + anal√Ωza metadat) a mapov√°n√≠ vztah≈Ø. Nap≈ô√≠klad m≈Ø≈æete zadat telefonn√≠ ƒç√≠slo, krypto penƒõ≈æenku nebo jm√©no osoby a okam≈æitƒõ vidƒõt, zda je oznaƒçeno, s k√Ωm/ƒç√≠m je spojeno a kter√©mu vzorci chov√°n√≠ odpov√≠d√°.

Tak√© budujeme forenzn√≠ n√°stroje pou≈æ√≠van√© vy≈°et≈ôovateli a integrujeme je do na≈°√≠ platformy pro je≈°tƒõ vƒõt≈°√≠ efektivitu. Sd√≠l√≠me sign√°ly s org√°ny ƒçinn√Ωmi v trestn√≠m ≈ô√≠zen√≠, partnersk√Ωmi bankami a dal≈°√≠mi vysoce rizikov√Ωmi platformami, abychom maximalizovali va≈°e ≈°ance na z√≠sk√°n√≠ prost≈ôedk≈Ø zpƒõt, pokud se stanete obƒõt√≠.

7.title: 7. Co zde najdete?
7.content:
Vyhled√°vac√≠ syst√©m pro v√≠ce ne≈æ 38 identifik√°tor≈Ø (nap≈ô. jm√©no, e-mail, telefon atd.), kter√Ω v√°m pom≈Ø≈æe urƒçit, zda m√°te co do ƒçinƒõn√≠ s podvodn√≠kem, a ochr√°nit va≈°e aktiva. Najdete p≈ôesn√Ω seznam podporovan√Ωch identifik√°tor≈Ø a n√°vod, jak vyhled√°vat v na≈°em syst√©mu.

Kdy≈æ dojde ke shodƒõ, objev√≠ se hl√°≈°en√≠ se v≈°emi dostupn√Ωmi podrobnostmi o podez≈ôel√©m a relevantn√≠mi informacemi o p≈ô√≠padu, kter√© v√°m pomohou minimalizovat riziko. M≈Ø≈æete tak√© nahl√°sit incident a naj√≠t dal≈°√≠ obƒõti stejn√©ho pachatele ‚Äî prost≈ôednictv√≠m koordinace a sd√≠len√≠ informac√≠ se ≈°ance na odhalen√≠ a st√≠h√°n√≠ v√Ωraznƒõ zvy≈°uj√≠.

8.title: 8. Kdo stoj√≠ za t√≠mto projektem?
8.content:
Mezin√°rodn√≠ t√Ωm vy≈°et≈ôovatel≈Ø a etick√Ωch hacker≈Ø ze t≈ô√≠ kontinent≈Ø a v√≠ce ne≈æ pƒõti zem√≠ ‚Äî experti na kybernetickou bezpeƒçnost, datovou analytiku a profesion√°lov√© s v√Ωcvikem a zku≈°enostmi ve zpravodajsk√©m ≈ôemesle.

Na≈°√≠m c√≠lem je z≈Østat nav≈ædy zdarma. Proto≈æe ƒçist√© samofinancov√°n√≠ nen√≠ dlouhodobƒõ udr≈æiteln√©, ƒç√°st projektu bude zahrnovat reklamu a budeme hledat dal≈°√≠ podporu prost≈ôednictv√≠m grant≈Ø a dar≈Ø od ve≈ôejnosti (pokud chcete pomoci, m≈Ø≈æete p≈ôispƒõt zde). Ve≈°ker√° metodologie, datov√© zdroje a financov√°n√≠ budou ve≈ôejnƒõ zdokumentov√°ny. Stav√≠me na transparentnosti, proto≈æe d≈Øvƒõra se mus√≠ zaslou≈æit ‚Äî ne pouze deklarovat.

9.title: 9. Co pl√°nujeme do budoucna?
9.content: N√≠≈æe m≈Ø≈æete vidƒõt tabulku, kter√° p≈ôesnƒõ ukazuje, co budujeme d√°l a co jsme ji≈æ dodali. ScamNemesis si klade za c√≠l st√°t se nejefektivnƒõj≈°√≠m a nejroz≈°√≠≈ôenƒõj≈°√≠m n√°strojem pro aktivn√≠ naru≈°en√≠, prevenci a detekci podvod≈Ø. Koncept je ve v√Ωvoji v√≠ce ne≈æ rok. Vƒõ≈ô√≠me, ≈æe se ScamNemesis m≈Ø≈æeme v√Ωraznƒõ sn√≠≈æit podvody.

roadmap.title: List of Features and Services We're Building
roadmap.description: For each item we list its status, completion percentage, and a brief note on what it's for.

recovery.title: Fraud Recovery Services
recovery.description: Recovery of funds lost to fraud. We combine digital forensics, OSINT, and legal coordination to trace, freeze, and recover your money‚Äîfast, ethically, and defensibly.
recovery.priceNote: We offer this service in response to companies that charge ‚Ç¨3,500‚Äì‚Ç¨10,000 and often only report the case to a financial institution. We consider such practices fraudulent and unethical.

analysis.title: Case analysis
analysis.desc: Assessment of the real chance of recovery, evidence collection and evaluation.

forensics.title: Digital forensics
forensics.desc: Blockchain tracing, OSINT, communication and metadata analysis.

freezing.title: Asset freezing
freezing.desc: Contacting banks and exchanges, preparing and sending Freezing Letters.

legal.title: Legal coordination
legal.desc: Drafting orders and filings, coordination with attorneys and authorities.

support.title: Victim support
support.desc: Reporting, ongoing communication, recommendations and prevention.

suitable.1: If you became a victim of fraudulent transfers (crypto/fiat), phishing, "romance," and investment schemes.
suitable.2: If you experienced account takeover and suspicious withdrawals via an exchange or bank.
suitable.3: If you need to quickly block assets and provide defensible evidence.

dueDiligence.title: DUE DILIGENCE SERVICES
dueDiligence.description: Independent screening of partners, clients, and investments. We combine OSINT, AML/KYB procedures, and a legal perspective so you can make decisions based on verifiable facts‚Äîfast, discreet, and defensible.

entity.title: Entity and UBO identification
entity.desc: KYB/KYC, verification of registrations, ownership structure, PEP and sanctions checks.

reputation.title: Reputational and legal screening
reputation.desc: adverse media, litigation, insolvency registers, regulatory actions.

financial.title: Financial and operational indicators
financial.desc: baseline financial health, affiliations, red flags (debt, tax arrears).

technical.title: Technical and security footprint
technical.desc: domains, infrastructure, emails, data leaks, digital footprints of key people.

business.title: Business ties and conflicts of interest
business.desc: network mapping of partners, risky connections, political exposure.

deliverables.title: Deliverables
deliverables.desc: risk summary (RAG), detailed report with evidence, red flags, and recommended actions (monitoring, contractual clauses).

appropriate.1: Onboarding a new client/vendor or third-party risk management (TPRM).
appropriate.2: M&A, joint venture, investor entry, franchise/licensing.
appropriate.3: Suspected links to fraud, sanctioned entities, or money laundering.
appropriate.4: Meeting AML/CTF obligations or requirements from a bank, investor, or internal compliance audit.

investigation.title: CORPORATE INVESTIGATIONS
investigation.description: Internal and external investigations for companies. We combine OSINT, digital forensics, and financial analytics with the ScamNemesis platform (evidence management, chain of custody)‚Äîdiscreet, lawful, and defensible.

appropriate.1: Suspected internal fraud or conflict of interest.
appropriate.4: Brand/IP abuse: cloned websites, fake profiles.
appropriate.5: Pre-litigation or compliance phase when you need defensible evidence for the board, bank, or auditor.

training.title: SECURITY TRAINING & CONSULTING
training.description: Security training and consulting for teams and management. We use real scenarios from ScamNemesis (OSINT, fraud, incident response) to make procedures practical, measurable, and defensible.

osint.title: OSINT & privacy hygiene
osint.desc: safe searching, identity and metadata protection.

policy.title: Policy and playbook development
policy.desc: IR runbooks, reporting flows, chain of custody.

consulting.title: Process consulting
consulting.desc: TPRM/AML/KYB and preparation of audit evidence.

appropriate.1: When onboarding new hires or scaling teams with access to money/data.
appropriate.2: After an incident to reduce repeat risk and shorten response time.
appropriate.3: Before an audit or investment, or when onboarding a major client (TPRM/AML requirements).
appropriate.4: If you face phishing, brand abuse, or fraudulent orders.
appropriate.5: When you need practical playbooks for the board, finance, and frontline teams.

consultation.title: BOOK A FREE CONSULTATION NOW
consultation.description: We would love to learn more about your company's individual needs. That's why we offer a 15-minute consultation call.

freeTraining.title: Free Security Training & Courses ‚Äî Learn to Spot Scams
freeTraining.description: Free, practical lessons and checklists to identify phishing, crypto/investment fraud, fake online shops, and social-media scams. Learn to verify websites, people, and IBANs; protect your identity and credit score; and report cybercrime safely‚Äîstep by step.
topics: How to prevent fraud in business

certifications.description: Years of experience and certifications from leading institutions ‚Äî professionals on your side.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.description: You can contact us by email. But if you want to report a scam, please click the button below and fill out the form ‚Äî without it, we won't be able to help you effectively.

supportUs.title: Support us
supportUs.subtitle: Join our mission
supportUs.description: ScamNemesis is a non-profit community project. We are building tools that help people verify identities, report fraud, and recover lost funds. Your support helps us maintain servers, develop new features, and keep the platform free for everyone.

donate.title: Financial Support
donate.description: Every donation helps us maintain and improve the platform. We accept crypto and traditional payments.

spread.title: Spread the Word
spread.description: Share ScamNemesis with friends, family, and colleagues. The more people know about us, the safer everyone becomes.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Are you a developer, designer, or security expert? Join our team and help build the future of fraud prevention.

report.title: Report Scams
report.description: Every report strengthens our database and helps protect others. Your experience can save someone else.

supportUs.cryptoDescription: We accept various cryptocurrencies. Click to copy the wallet address.

trainingCourses.title: Training & Courses
trainingCourses.subtitle: Learn to protect yourself
trainingCourses.description: Free, practical lessons and checklists to identify phishing, crypto/investment fraud, fake online shops, and social-media scams. Learn to verify websites, people, and IBANs; protect your identity and credit score; and report cybercrime safely‚Äîstep by step.

moneyRecovery.title: Money Recovery
moneyRecovery.subtitle: Get your money back
moneyRecovery.description: Recovery of funds lost to fraud. We combine digital forensics, OSINT, and legal coordination to trace, freeze, and recover your money‚Äîfast, ethically, and defensibly.

step1.title: Initial Assessment
step1.description: We evaluate your case to determine the likelihood of recovery and the best approach.

step2.title: Investigation
step2.description: Our team traces the funds using blockchain analysis, OSINT, and other forensic techniques.

step3.title: Asset Freezing
step3.description: We contact banks and exchanges to freeze the assets before they can be moved.

step4.title: Recovery
